author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Updates geometry building for EB/EE and solves the issue of failure in step2 or step3. This on top of the IB 11_2_X_2020-10-31-1100 runs dd4hep examples for all 3 steps

#### PR validation:

Tested using the runTheMatrix test workflows as preserved in SimG4Core/Configuration/test

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-gex32 Updates geometry building for EB/EE and solves the issue of failure
